Review_Text: The two friends succeed in making a heartwarming report of a true adventure on their bike- No ego's just fun friendship and preserverance.

Review_title: if it inspires you to be a better person, it must be something really good
Review_Text: I admire the persistence of Nono and Max.It's a documentary worth watching.A dash of humor, a whole serving of humanity, and a fountain of inspiration for nations across borders.Creative tale of life wrapped up in 1 hr and 29 minutes.You live, discover, challenge yourself, reach your aims, reach a crisis in purpose, then at a certain point make bigger decisions that are bigger than yourself, all a combination of planning, journey, creativity, relationship building, and a lot of sacrifice.Kudos to your friendship and wheels that change lives.Education is always worth the sacrifice.To all the wonderful human beings you met, all who chipped in for the cause, such a big hope for this world in crisis to have a chance.It is a wonderfully created documentary, nice to watch for a second view of your own purpose in life. A beautiful packaging of the treasure there is in humanity, beyond borders.
Extremely sympathetic documentary about the bike trip of two friends from Germany to China. A little bit of tragedy, melancholy, hospitality, humor and a journey to yourself.
I really enjoyed the chemistry that these 2 friends have.The show was I felt was very genuine.One of the best travel shows I've watch.
